mapper.sql: t.id AS "id", t.type AS "type", t.reason AS "reason", t.start_time AS "startTime", t.end_time AS "endTime", t.LEAVE_DAY as "leaveDay", t.task_name AS "taskName", t.approval_result AS "approvalResult", t.SENDER_ID AS "senderId", d.name as "senderDeptName", u.name as "senderName", t.creater AS "creater", t.create_date AS "createDate", t.update_date AS "updateDate", t.del_flag AS "delFlag"
inner join T_PT_USER u on u.id = t.SENDER_ID left join T_PT_DEPT d on d.id = u.dept_id
mapper.select: SELECT t.id AS "id", t.type AS "type", t.reason AS "reason", t.start_time AS "startTime", t.end_time AS "endTime", t.LEAVE_DAY as "leaveDay", t.approval_result AS "approvalResult", t.SENDER_ID AS "senderId", d.name as "senderDeptName", u.name as "senderName", t.creater AS "creater", t.create_date AS "createDate", t.update_date AS "updateDate", t.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM T_AP_LEAVE_LOG t inner join T_PT_USER u on u.id = t.SENDER_ID left join T_PT_DEPT d on d.id = u.dept_id WHERE t.DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag} and t.ID = #{id}

select t.id as "id", r.ID as "taskId", r.PRO_DEF_NAME as "processName", t.type as "type", t.type as "leaveType", r.NAME as "taskName", u.name as "sender", t.LEAVE_DAY as "leaveDay", t.CREATE_DATE as "time" from V_WF_RU_TASK r inner join T_AP_LEAVE t on t.id = r.business_id inner join T_PT_USER u on u.id = t.sender_id
(r.ASSIGNEE = #{userId} or (r.ASSIGNEE is null and r.USER_ID = #{userId}))
AND t.type = #{leave.type}
order by t.CREATE_DATE desc

select t.id as "id", h.PROC_NAME as "processName", h.PROC_INST_ID as "processInstanceId", t.type as "type", t.task_name as "taskName", u.name as "sender", t.LEAVE_DAY as "leaveDay", t.CREATE_DATE as "time" from V_WF_HI_TASK h inner join T_AP_LEAVE t on t.id = h.business_id inner join T_PT_USER u on u.id = t.sender_id
(h.ASSIGNEE = #{userId} and h.START_USER_ID <> #{userId})
AND t.type = #{leave.type}
AND u.name LIKE concat('%',#{leave.senderName},'%')
order by t.CREATE_DATE desc
SELECT APPROVAL_RESULT FROM T_AP_LEAVE WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T_AP_LEAVE
id, type, reason, start_time, end_time, task_name, approval_result, SENDER_ID, LEAVE_DAY, creater, create_date, update_date, del_flag,
VALUES
#{id}, #{type}, #{reason}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{taskName}, #{approvalResult}, #{senderId}, #{leaveDay}, #{creater}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), #{delFlag},

INSERT INTO T_AP_LEAVE_LOG
id, type, reason, start_time, end_time, approval_result, SENDER_ID, LEAVE_DAY, creater, create_date, update_date, del_flag,
VALUES
#{id}, #{type}, #{reason}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{approvalResult}, #{senderId}, #{leaveDay}, #{creater}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), #{delFlag},
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM T_AP_LEAVE where id in
#{id}
